ABOUT.TITLE: About Institut Y&Y
ABOUT.INTRO: Nestled in the heart of Montreal, Institut Y&Y is more than just a hair salon. It's a true wellness sanctuary, designed to enhance your natural beauty while offering you a moment of relaxation.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH1: Our team of passionate hairdressers combines expertise, creativity, and attentiveness to meet all your desires: from trendy cuts to vibrant coloring, including deep and personalized hair treatments.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH2: At Y&Y, every client is unique. We take the time to listen to you, analyze your face shape, hair type, and habits to offer a tailored service that matches your style.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH3: We use only premium professional products and up-to-date techniques to guarantee long-lasting, elegant, and hair-friendly results.

COLOR.TITLE: Coloring and highlights:
COLOR.DESC: to illuminate your hair and enhance your glow.

CARE.TITLE: Hair care:
CARE.DESC: to nourish, repair, and deeply strengthen.

SMOOTHING.TITLE: Smoothing and perms:
SMOOTHING.DESC: for a controlled texture, straight or curly.

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding & special event hairstyles:
WEDDING.DESC: for an unforgettable look on your big day.

ABOUT.CONCLUSION: Book your appointment today and enjoy a unique experience in Montreal at Institut Y&Y. Let us take care of you and your hair with passion and excellence.

DASHBOARD.CONFIRMED_INFO: Confirmed appointments can be canceled up to 48 hours before the scheduled time.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Our team is available for any questions or appointment requests.

ABOUT.TITLE: ABOUT US
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
Welcome to Institut Y&Y, your sanctuary of beauty and well-being in Montreal.

Located in the heart of the city, our women’s hair salon offers a unique experience combining expertise, creativity, and personalized care. Whether you’re looking for a modern haircut, vibrant color, or deep treatment, our team is here to reveal your hair’s natural beauty.

We use high-quality products and cutting-edge techniques to provide services tailored to your needs. At Institut Y&Y, every client is unique—we take the time to understand your style and deliver a look that suits you best.

Whether you're in for relaxation or a bold transformation, we promise exceptional service and a memorable experience. Discover the art of hairstyling with a luxurious touch in Montreal.

APPOINT.TITLE: Book in just a few clicks, relax

ONLINE.TITLE: Online Booking
ONLINE.TEXT: Check our calendar at any time to book your next service. Log in or create an account to request a personalized appointment. We're here for you!

PHONE.TITLE: Phone Appointment
PHONE.TEXT: Prefer to speak with a professional to schedule your visit? Our team is here for you during our business hours. Feel free to give us a call!

BIO.TITLE: Y&Y Excellence with La Biosthétique
BIO.DESCRIPTION:
At Y&Y Salon, we’ve chosen excellence by offering La Biosthétique products — a reference in high-end hair care. From the first application, your hair gains shine, softness, and long-lasting brilliance.

But our expertise goes further. With personalized express treatments, we care for your scalp: hair loss, itching, dryness, or dandruff — every concern has a solution.

Not sure what’s right for you? Our expert stylists are here to guide you toward the perfect routine for daily hair beauty.

HOURS.TITLE: Opening Hours
HOURS.FOOTER: Our team welcomes you with pleasure during opening hours. See you soon at Y&Y!

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.INTRO: We offer a complete range of hair care products to suit all hair types and every desire. Whether you're looking to refresh your cut, brighten your color, or deeply condition your hair, our team is here to help.

HAIRCUT.TITLE: Haircuts
HAIRCUT.SHORT_DESC: A fresh, precise and modern style for easy maintenance.
HAIRCUT.MEDIUM_DESC: Perfect balance between volume, flexibility and movement.
HAIRCUT.LONG_DESC: Elegant shaping to enhance your length.

STYLING.TITLE: Blow-Dry Styling
STYLING.SHORT_DESC: A structured blowout for a chic and lasting effect.
STYLING.MEDIUM_DESC: Controlled volume for a naturally beautiful look.
STYLING.LONG_DESC: Shine and softness for a flawless finish.

COLORATION.TITLE: Coloring
COLORATION.ROOTS_DESC: Blend your regrowth for a uniform color.
COLORATION.FULL_DESC: A fresh new look with shine and brilliance.
COLORATION.BLEACH_DESC: For intense blond or a light base before coloring.

HIGHLIGHTS.TITLE: Highlights
HIGHLIGHTS.HALF_DESC: Natural lightening to brighten your face.
HIGHLIGHTS.FULL_DESC: A luminous effect across the entire hair.

BALAYAGE.TITLE: Balayage
BALAYAGE.PARTIAL_DESC: Subtle touches for a sun-kissed effect on the lengths.
BALAYAGE.FULL_DESC: Luminous gradient for a natural and sophisticated look.

TREATMENTS.TITLE: Hair Treatments
TREATMENTS.MASK_DESC: Intense hydration for soft and shiny hair.
TREATMENTS.FUSIO_DESC: Tailored cocktail to deeply repair and revitalize.
TREATMENTS.BOTOX_DESC: Smoothing, shine and volume in one complete transformation.

EXTENSIONS.TITLE: Hair Extensions
EXTENSIONS.CLIP_DESC: Clip-in extensions to add length and volume.
EXTENSIONS.COLD_DESC: Cold fusion extensions for a natural and lasting result.
EXTENSIONS.HOT_DESC: Hot fusion extensions for a glamorous and voluminous effect.

SERVICES.DISCLAIMER: * Prices are indicative and may vary depending on hair length, thickness, and stylist expertise.
